column9: Was on drug regimen that worked for my bi-polar then traumatic life event suddenly occurred and my meds seem to stop working overnight. I was hospitalized in March 2010 and placed on resperdal 2mg at bedtime.  I am careful about my weight as I take other medications that cause fluctuations.  Until today (12/5/10) I was unaware this medication caused weight gain.  In the last 4 months I've gained over 20 lbs even though I've been trying to control my weight.  I'm heavier than I've ever been and I also suffer from Fibromyalgia and am small framed.  My body can't take the extra weight as its too hard on my joints.  I am now considering having my meds changed.  I've been through that too alot thru the years and don't like to mess with a good regimen but I really am having a hard time with my added weight and wonder if the risperdal has contributed.
